short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get random Steely Dan lyrics in browser notifications! One per 7 hours. Click button for song, album, & cover art.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for all Steely Dan fans! Every 7 hours this extension puts a Steely Dan lyric snippet in a browser notification. Can't remember which song the lyric is from? Click on the extension button to see the lyric, the song, the album, and the album art!
